name: The Little Guardian (SunnyChowTheGuy)
description:
This is a mini game developed for Global Game Jam 2023, inspired by world setting of The Little Prince, and mechanic of Super Mario Galaxy. In a short limit of time, Player has to control protagonist to jump between his 2 mini planets and remove invasive plants with his shovel. You can also dig up some carrot and cook it in a volcano  if you need to refill health.

In the novel, it's mentioned that baobab trees are a dangerous menace. Without carefully monitoring, their roots may destroy a small planet. We feel this mechanic is very funny so we decided to make a game for it. But for gameplay reason, we change the baobab trees to vine.

Control
WASD - Move
Mouse - Move Camera
Space - Jump
E - Interact
Left Click - Dig/Attack
Right Click - Reset Camera

Dev Use
Esc - instant quit
T - instant spawn falling seed
Y - instant reduce 1 hp
